alert.note: Alert for Haywood; Lauderdale; Tipton (Tennessee) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Tipton, eastern Lauderdale and northwestern Haywood Counties through 1130 AM CDT... At 1059 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Covington, moving northeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Brownsville, Covington, Ripley, Nutbush, Belle Eagle, Forked Deer, Henning, Gates, Allens, Dryhill, Christmasville, Flippin, Turnpike, Rialto, Curve, Cotton Lake, Orysa, Rudolph, Tibbs and Durhamville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
